verses.verse: And after<WH310> Abimelech<WH40> there arose<WH6965> to defend<WH3467> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> Tola<WH8439> the son<WH1121> of Puah,<WH6312> the son<WH1121> of Dodo,<WH1734> a man<WH376> of Issachar;<WH3485> and he<WH1931> dwelt<WH3427> in Shamir<WH8069> in mount<WH2022> Ephraim.<WH669>
And he judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> twenty<WH6242> and three<WH7969> years,<WH8141> and died,<WH4191> and was buried<WH6912> in Shamir.<WH8069>
And after<WH310> him arose<WH6965> Jair,<WH2971> a Gileadite,<WH1569> and judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> twenty<WH6242> and two<WH8147> years.<WH8141>

And he had<WH1961> thirty<WH7970> sons<WH1121> that rode<WH7392> on<WH5921> thirty<WH7970> ass colts,<WH5895> and they had thirty<WH7970> cities,<WH5892> which are called<WH7121> Havoth-jair<WH2334> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> which<WH834> are in the land<WH776> of Gilead.<WH1568>
And Jair<WH2971> died,<WH4191> and was buried<WH6912> in Camon.<WH7056>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> again<WH3254> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD,<WH3068> and served<WH5647> <WH853> Baalim,<WH1168> and Ashtaroth,<WH6252> and the gods<WH430> of Syria,<WH758> and the gods<WH430> of Zidon,<WH6721> and the gods<WH430> of Moab,<WH4124> and the gods<WH430> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and the gods<WH430> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and forsook<WH5800> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> and served<WH5647> not<WH3808> him.

And the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> was hot<WH2734> against Israel,<WH3478> and he sold<WH4376> them into the hands<WH3027> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and into the hands<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon.<WH5983>

And that<WH1931> year<WH8141> they vexed<WH7492> and oppressed<WH7533> <WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> eighteen<WH8083> <WH6240> years,<WH8141> <WH853> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> that<WH834> were on the other side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> in the land<WH776> of the Amorites,<WH567> which<WH834> is in Gilead.<WH1568>

Moreover the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> passed over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan<WH3383> to fight<WH3898> also<WH1571> against Judah,<WH3063> and against Benjamin,<WH1144> and against the house<WH1004> of Ephraim;<WH669> so that Israel<WH3478> was sore<WH3966> distressed.<WH3334>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cried<WH2199> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> We have sinned<WH2398> against thee, both because<WH3588> we have forsaken<WH5800> <WH853> our God,<WH430> and also served<WH5647> <WH853> Baalim.<WH1168>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH3413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> Did not<WH3808> I deliver you from the Egyptians,<WH4480> <WH4714> and from<WH4480> the Amorites,<WH567> from<WH4480> the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and from<WH4480> the Philistines?<WH6430>

The Zidonians<WH6722> also, and the Amalekites,<WH6002> and the Maonites,<WH4584> did oppress<WH3905> you; and ye cried<WH6817> to<WH413> me, and I delivered<WH3467> you out of their hand.<WH4480> <WH3027>
Yet ye<WH859> have forsaken<WH5800> me, and served<WH5647> other<WH312> gods:<WH430> wherefore<WH3651> I will deliver<WH3467> you no<WH3808> more.<WH3254>
Go <WH1980> and cry<WH2199> unto<WH413> the gods<WH430> which<WH834> ye have chosen;<WH977> let them<WH1992> deliver<WH3467> you in the time<WH6256> of your tribulation.<WH6869>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> We have sinned:<WH2398> do<WH6213> thou<WH859> unto us whatsoever<WH3605> seemeth good<WH2896> unto<WH5869> thee; deliver<WH5337> us only,<WH389> we pray thee,<WH4994> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

And they put away<WH5493> <WH853> the strange<WH5236> gods<WH430> from among<WH4480> <WH7130> them, and served<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD:<WH3068> and his soul<WH5315> was grieved<WH7114> for the misery<WH5999> of Israel.<WH3478>

Then the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> were gathered together,<WH6817> and encamped<WH2583> in Gilead.<WH1568> And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> assembled themselves together,<WH622> and encamped<WH2583> in Mizpeh.<WH4709>

And the people<WH5971> and princes<WH8269> of Gilead<WH1568> said<WH559> one<WH376> to<WH413> another,<WH7453> What<WH4310> man<WH376> is he that<WH834> will begin<WH2490> to fight<WH3898> against the children<WH1121> of Ammon?<WH5983> he shall be<WH1961> head<WH7218> over all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gilead.<WH1568>
